TXT_orgId_tooltip: This is a unique identifier of your organization. It can't be changed after creation.
TXT_orgId_error: Identifier must be between 4 and 12 chars / digits with no space
TXT_orgId_unavailable: Identifier already in use. Please Choose another
TXT_email_change_message: After an email change, a verification email will be sent to the new address
TXT_org_join_message: Click Join button to request organisation membership
TXT_org_join_pending: Your request is pending approval. When approved, you'll be routed to our home page
TXT_org_invited_join: Your invite is being processed. You will shortly be routed to our home page
